definition: to lean/to slant/oblique/prejudiced/to deviate from average/to stray from the intended line/stubbornly/contrary to expectations
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
angle of drift (navigation)/deflection (from course)/angle of divergence

sentences.english: A rigid outboard support system negates spindle deflection.
sentences.chinese: 僵化的舷外支持系統的否定主軸偏轉。

sentences.english: Anti-fungal deflects odor and keeps your feet insulated throughout the day.
sentences.chinese: 抗真菌偏轉氣味和保持你的腳在一天絕緣。

sentences.english: The laser optical beam deflection method is one of the noncontact sensing technique.
sentences.chinese: 激光光束偏轉法是一種非接觸的探測技術。

sentences.english: That excursion was carried out in summer.
sentences.chinese: 這種偏轉將在夏季進行。

sentences.english: The temperature change is displayed by the deflection degree of cursor of galvanometer.
sentences.chinese: 通過靈敏電流計光標的偏轉角度顯示溫度的變化。

sentences.english: The corresponding electric currents are used to deflect an electron beam in a cathode-ray tube.
sentences.chinese: 相應的電流就用來使陰極射線管裏的電子束偏轉。

sentences.english: For he too deflects seduction from its rule of secrecy, and does so intentionally.
sentences.chinese: 他祕密的從它的規則裏偏轉誘惑，並且是故意地。

sentences.english: And so, there is a little bit of deflection because plus repels plus.
sentences.chinese: 並且有一小部分的偏轉，是由於正電荷排斥正電荷。

sentences.english: The program of controlling the deflexion distance of ink is researched.
sentences.chinese: 研究了程序控制墨滴的偏轉位移的實現方法。

sentences.english: It can equip with deflection coil.
A new achromatic isochronous deflection system is described.
sentences.chinese: 描述了一種新的消色差等時性磁偏轉系統。

sentences.english: Charged drops are deflected by an amount that scales with the charge on the drops.
sentences.chinese: 充電墨滴被按照充電電荷的比例進行偏轉。

sentences.english: The main thing is to try. You might get a deflection .
sentences.chinese: 嘗試是非常重要的，你可能會射門受到偏轉。

sentences.english: The driver of the car sheered to avoid hitting the squirrel .
sentences.chinese: 爲了避免壓着松鼠，汽車司機偏轉了車子。

sentences.english: Both ends of the joint can be arbitrary deflected for free adjustment of axial or lateral displacement.
sentences.chinese: 接頭兩端可任意偏轉，便於自由調節軸向或橫向位移。

sentences.english: The general theory and experiment-al method for measuring the TV deflecting magnetic field are given in detail.
sentences.chinese: 詳細論述了測量偏轉線圈磁場的原理及方法。

definition: lit. to directly attack Huanglong/fig. to directly combat the root of a problem
to charge/to pounce on/to swoop down on
lit. bleak wind and icy rain (idiom)/fig. hardships/miserable circumstances
to turn a deaf ear to (idiom); to pretend not to hear
